dynamic-hql.query:
SELECT new com.netsteadfast.greenstep.vo.SysJreportVO(m.oid, m.reportId, m.file, m.isCompile, m.description) FROM TbSysJreport m WHERE 1=1
<#if reportId??> and m.reportId = :reportId </#if>
ORDER BY m.reportId ASC

SELECT count(*) FROM TbSysJreport m WHERE 1=1
<#if reportId??> and m.reportId = :reportId </#if>
